Name: Percentage of cases where Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR occurs out of all completed reimbursement cases
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR following Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Number of times Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR is directly preceded by Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' occurs

Name: Percentage of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR events that lead to Request Payment within the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Request Payment'

Name: Frequency of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR in variants that bypass Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER entirely
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Percentage of cases with Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR that originate from a resubmission after Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR executions that occur in cases with total Amount above 100 euros
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR relative to the total frequency of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of cases where Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR follows Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER without subsequent rejections
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Ratio of cases with Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR to cases with Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR events that are part of the top three most frequent process variants
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR executions that occur within variants where the supervisor and budget owner are the same person (implied by absence of both approval steps)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' does not happen

Name: Frequency of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR immediately followed by Request Payment without any intervening rejection or rework
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Request Payment'

Name: Percentage of cases with Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR that complete the process (reach Payment Handled) within two months of initial submission
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of variants containing Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR that do not include any rejection activity (e.g., Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER, Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION, etc.)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Number of variants where Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR appears without any prior approval from PRE_APPROVER or BUDGET OWNER
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' activities

Name: Percentage of cases where Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR is the first approval step after submission (i.e., no intermediate approvals)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of variants ending in Payment Handled that include Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR but never include Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR in 2018 compared to 2017
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' activities

Name: Number of times Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR occurs in cases that had exactly one submission attempt (i.e., no resubmissions after rejection)
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' activities
